name: New York City Health and Hospital Corporation

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: New York City Health and Hospital Corporation is a Case Management provider based in New York, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $45.8M in Medicaid payments across 153K claims.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider appears to operate as a fiscal intermediary or management organization, processing payments on behalf of many individual caregivers. High aggregate billing is expected for this type of entity.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $45.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
